parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the Prometheus instance.

parameters.name: FlinkWorkSpaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Flink workspace.

parameters.name: FlinkWorkSpaceName
parameters.description: The name of the Flink workspace.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: TargetUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the Flink workspace belongs.
